hero.subtitle: Short, steady conversations that hold complexity without promising quick fixes.
hero.primaryCtaAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage

fit.title: When this support helps
fit.description: Clients come to us when life is shifting and they want grounded partnership, not hype.
bullets: Relocating to or within the UK and wanting space to design rhythms that respect your health and values.
Re-entering or reshaping work after care, study or upheaval and needing language that feels honest.
Balancing leadership, migration or community responsibilities while protecting energy and agency.
Holding mixed feelings about change—relief, pressure, grief—and needing time to process before acting.

approach.title: How we work together
approach.description: We keep the structure light, ethical and client-led so you stay in charge of decisions.
bullets: Every session begins with what matters most to you right now.
We reflect patterns, ask clarifying questions and co-design small experiments.
You leave with 1–3 next steps or reflections, not a script to obey.
Between sessions we offer light check-ins only when you request them.

services.title: Choose your focus
services.description: Each package responds to the transitions our clients meet most often.

cards.title: Confidence & voice

cards.title: Experiments & stewardship
cards.description: Four sessions to design ethical experiments when change affects others.
cards.imageAlt: Shapes connected with lines showing iteration

support.title: What keeps us grounded
support.description: ICF ethics guide our practice and lived migration experience keeps it real.
bullets: Non-directive partnership: we co-create direction instead of prescribing.
We hold power, class, race, health and care roles in view without judgement.
Practical and reflective work sit together—both matter for sustainable change.
If coaching is not the right support, we signpost other services transparently.
